DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter randomized trial evaluating induction treatment with VIP-reinforced-ABVD (VIP-rABVD) versus CHOP/21 in patients with newly diagnosed peripheral T cell lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: Study About Treatment of Newly Diagnosed Non Cutaneous Peripheral T Cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: Induction therapy: ARM 1: 6 Chemotherapy courses = 3 VIP alternated with 3 ABVD ARM 2: 8 Chemotherapy courses = CHOP every 21 days Consolidation therapy: For all patients if CR = radiotherapy 40GY / 5X1,8 GY per week
